main event: Four bright bluish-white lights were observed flaming over Islip and then disappeared at high speed.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 40 minutes., The observers reported seeing the lights move towards an easterly direction., Pilot reports indicated similar observations in the area., Weather conditions were clear with a bright moon., Interceptor pilots reported seeing the aurora borealis in the area at the time of the sighting.
witness description: civilian from Long Island, reliability unknown
